title: ESP-IGERT and SFS Visit the Argonne National Laboratory - IGERT Electronic Security and Privacy: Technological, Human, Enterprise, and Legal Considerations
contents: Search this site     Program Overview Sponsors FAQ People Faculty Staff Fellows Associates Alumni Research Publications Curriculum Courses Seminars Outreach International Partners Links And Resources Internships CyberCorps SFS Alumni HS-STEM Scholarships Apply           News ESP-IGERT Calendar Departments Contact Us Sitemap          Curriculum ‎ > ‎ Seminars ‎ > ‎   ESP-IGERT and SFS Visit the Argonne National Laboratory            This Tuesday, April 15, ESP-IGERT Fellows and SFS students and Faculty visited the Information Assurance Center at Argonne National Laboratory. The visit provided a valuable insight into the cybersecurity operations and research and employment opportunities at Argonne.    The visit to the Information Assurance center was followed by a tour of the Advanced Photon Source facility and the Rare Isotopes Facility.
